data.message:
He reached depths of darkness and was told and felt he should give up, but he persevered despite what everyone thought. He may be a rapper and he may have portrayed some negative impact, but who says we should only see a leader in the most appropriate people. Everyone who steps up to their dream deserves respect. Don't judge a book by its cover has Eminem all over it. He inspires people who think they are too dark or lost, but everyone should be inspired by his journey. 
#eminem
